title: Sales Development Representative (4+ years experience)
description:
Join Huzzle’s Talent Pool as an Appointment Setter!



Apply here: 



At Huzzle, we connect top-tier Appointment Setters & SDRs with leading companies across the UK, US, and Europe. Whether it’s a startup, scale-up, agency, or enterprise, our clients trust us to find the best talent. We only admit the top 3% of candidates into our talent pool, ensuring they are matched with exclusive, long-term opportunities. Unlike an outsourcing agency, we place you directly with a client where you’re hired in-house to work full-time as a valued member of their team.



WHO THIS IS FOR:

You're looking to:

• Work with top-tier clients in the industry and secure long-term, stable opportunities.

• Advance your career through access to exclusive roles and ongoing professional development.

• Be valued and respected for your skills and contributions in a supportive work environment.

• Earn a competitive salary with regular pay increases and success-based bonuses.

• Stop fighting for opportunities across different platforms, and let us match you with roles where we believe you'll excel.



And if you're:

• Tired of job-hopping and want a stable, long-term position.

• Frustrated by lack of support or training in previous roles.

• Looking for meaningful work where your contributions are recognized and rewarded.

• Eager to work full-time for a reputable company that values your expertise.



What We Offer:

Competitive Pay: Starting at 37K PHP/month with regular pay raises and success-based bonuses:

• Month 1: 37K PHP/month + bonus

• Month 3: 40.7K PHP/month + bonus

• Month 6: 44.4K PHP/month + bonus

• Month 9: 46.25K PHP/month + bonus

Exclusive Access: Work with top companies and enjoy long-term client relationships.

Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, from the comfort of your home.



Your Role as an Appointment Setter:

• Proactive Outreach: Engage potential clients and partners through phone,
, and social media platforms.

• Seamless Scheduling: Coordinate meetings and manage calendars for the sales teams, ensuring a smooth experience for both the team and potential clients.

• CRM Mastery: Keep meticulous records of all interactions, appointments, and follow-up activities in a CRM system.

• Database Management: Regularly update and review the contact database to maintain accuracy and relevancy.

• Active Communication: Collaborate with sales and marketing to understand offerings and effectively communicate the value proposition.

• Optimize & Succeed: Monitor appointment success rates and work closely with the team to refine strategies for higher conversions.

• Industry Savvy: Stay updated on industry trends to engage clients effectively and address their needs.





Who We're Looking For:

• Experience: At least 4 years of experience with Appointment Setting, Cold Calling, and Outbound Messaging (LinkedIn, Cold
s).

• Sales Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with relevant sales and outreach tools (CRMs, Prospecting Tools, Automation Tools, etc).

• Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients.

• Organizational Skills: Excellent time management and the ability to juggle multiple schedules.

• Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Docs, Google Sheets, CRM systems, and communication tools like Slack, ChatGPT, Zoom, and LinkedIn.

• Remote Ready: Able to work effectively in a remote environment with a reliable laptop and internet connection.

• Detail-Oriented: A keen eye for detail and a commitment to maintaining high-quality data in systems.



Our Hiring Process:

• Submit Your Application

• Screening AI Video Interview (15 min max)

• Final Face-to-Face Interview

• Successful candidates are admitted to our talent pool, gaining access to exclusive opportunities.

• We match you with a client for a final interview



Please note that by applying & completing our interview process, you will be added to our talent pool. This means you’ll be considered for this and all future global opportunities that match your skills - no need to apply multiple times!





Application Requirements:

1. Make sure the Subject of the application is the name of the Capital City of Canada otherwise your application won't be reviewed.

2. Share your Resume/CV and any relevant experience / projects you've worked on.

3. Send anything else that can set you apart!

Whether it’s a startup, scale-up, agency, or enterprise, our clients trust us to find the best talent. We only admit the top 3% of candidates into our talent pool, ensuring they are matched with exclusive, long-term opportunities. Unlike an outsourcing agency, we place you directly with a client where you’re hired in-house to work full-time as a valued member of their team.



WHO THIS IS FOR:

You're looking to:

• Work with top-tier clients in the industry and secure long-term, stable opportunities.

• Advance your career through access to exclusive roles and ongoing professional development.

• Be valued and respected for your skills and contributions in a supportive work environment.

• Earn a competitive salary with regular pay increases and success-based bonuses.

• Stop fighting for opportunities across different platforms, and let us match you with roles where we believe you'll excel.



And if you're:

• Tired of job-hopping and want a stable, long-term position.

• Frustrated by lack of support or training in previous roles.

• Looking for meaningful work where your contributions are recognized and rewarded.

• Eager to work full-time for a reputable company that values your expertise.



What We Offer:

Competitive Pay: Starting at 30K PHP/month with regular pay raises and success-based bonuses:

• Month 1: 30K PHP/month + bonus

• Month 3: 33K PHP/month + bonus

• Month 6: 36K PHP/month + bonus

• Month 9: 38K PHP/month + bonus

Exclusive Access: Work with top companies and enjoy long-term client relationships.

Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, from the comfort of your home.



Your Role as an Appointment Setter:

• Proactive Outreach: Engage potential clients and partners through phone,
, and social media platforms.

• Seamless Scheduling: Coordinate meetings and manage calendars for the sales teams, ensuring a smooth experience for both the team and potential clients.

• CRM Mastery: Keep meticulous records of all interactions, appointments, and follow-up activities in a CRM system.

• Database Management: Regularly update and review the contact database to maintain accuracy and relevancy.

• Active Communication: Collaborate with sales and marketing to understand offerings and effectively communicate the value proposition.

• Optimize & Succeed: Monitor appointment success rates and work closely with the team to refine strategies for higher conversions.

• Industry Savvy: Stay updated on industry trends to engage clients effectively and address their needs.





Who We're Looking For:

• Experience: At least 1 years of experience with Appointment Setting, Cold Calling, and Outbound Messaging (LinkedIn, Cold
s).

• Sales Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with relevant sales and outreach tools (CRMs, Prospecting Tools, Automation Tools, etc).

• Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients.

• Organizational Skills: Excellent time management and the ability to juggle multiple schedules.

• Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Docs, Google Sheets, CRM systems, and communication tools like Slack, ChatGPT, Zoom, and LinkedIn.

• Remote Ready: Able to work effectively in a remote environment with a reliable laptop and internet connection.

• Detail-Oriented: A keen eye for detail and a commitment to maintaining high-quality data in systems.



 Our Hiring Process:

• Step 1: Screening Interview

• Step 2: Take-home Task

• Step 3: Successful candidates are admitted to our talent pool, gaining access to exclusive opportunities.

• Step 4: We match you with a client for a final interview.



Application Requirements:

1. Make sure the Subject of the application is the name of the Capital City of Canada otherwise your application won't be reviewed.

2. Share your Resume/CV and any relevant experience / projects you've worked on.

3. Send anything else that can set you apart!

title: Level 3 Engineer (MSP)
description:
DO NOT APPLY UNLESS YOU READ THE ENTIRE JOB POST, HAVE THE REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND FOLLOWED ALL INSTRUCTIONS. 

** Job Title: Level 3 Engineer (MSP) 

** Location: Remote 

** Job Type: Full-time 

** Shift:  5:00 AM PHT - 2:00 PM PHT (will adjust 1 hour forward/back based on US daylight savings time)



Overview:

Our Managed Services Provider (MSP) is seeking an experienced and highly skilled Level 3 MSP Engineer to serve as the senior escalation point for complex issues, lead root cause analysis efforts, and execute advanced infrastructure projects. This role requires deep technical expertise, strong troubleshooting capabilities, and the ability to work independently while collaborating with both internal teams and clients. You will be responsible for handling the most challenging issues within our environment and ensuring long-term stability, reliability, and performance of client systems.



Responsibilities:



Act as the primary escalation point for Level 1 and Level 2 engineers, resolving advanced and high-complexity technical issues.



Perform comprehensive root cause analysis (RCA) on recurring or high-impact i
, and implement long-term fixes and prevention strategies.



Lead and participate in infrastructure projects, including server deployments, migrations, network redesigns, security implementations, and cloud initiatives.



Design, configure, deploy, and maintain virtualized environments using VMware and Hyper-V.



Manage and optimize firewall and security infrastructure, specifically SonicWall, along with Meraki and Cisco networking solutions.



Deploy, maintain, and troubleshoot Dell Servers, storage systems, and related enterprise hardware.



Oversee backup, disaster recovery, and business continuity solutions, ensuring compliance with best practices.



Review system performance, proactively identify risks, and recommend improvements or upgrades to strengthen client environments.



Collaborate with the team to improve processes, documentation, and technical standards across the MSP.



Maintain high levels of professionalism and communication when interacting with clients, ensuring clarity and confidence in all engagements.



Requirements:



5+ years MSP experience in a Level 3 or Senior Engineer capacity.



Expert-level knowledge of VMware ESXi/vCenter, Microsoft Hyper-V, and virtual infrastructure best practices.



Strong networking proficiency with Cisco, Meraki, SonicWall, including firewall rules, VPNs, VLANs, routing, switching, and wireless.



Extensive hands-on experience with Dell Servers, storage systems, RAID configurations, lifecycle management, and hardware troubleshooting.



Deep understanding of Windows Server environments (AD, DNS, DHCP, Group Policy), cloud services (Microsoft 365, Azure), and backup/DR platforms.



Demonstrated ability to lead escalations, solve complex technical challenges, and provide guidance to junior tea
mbers.



Proven experience planning and executing IT projects from design through completion.



Excellent analytical thinking, documentation practices, and communication skills.



Ability to work independently, prioritize effectively, and operate well under pressure.



Strong customer service orientation with a calm and professional demeanor.





**Salary**

$2500 + Bonuses 



**Apply Now:** 

To be considered for this position please make sure you have relevant experience based on the outlined responsibilities and requirements. Please submit your resume and a quick video with the following: Your Favorite Animal, Your Favorite Food, Your Favorite Book, and Your Favorite Movie and why you should be considered for this position, otherwise you will not be considered for this position. Thank you!

title: Social Media + Influencer Outreach Assistant (Sauna & Float Spa)
description:
We are a Melbourne-based spa offering infrared sauna and float therapy. We focus on evidence-based wellness and aesthetic content.



Role Overview:

You will manage Instagram and TikTok content, basic video editing, Canva graphics, and influencer outreach. You must be proactive, communicate clearly, and request what you need instead of waiting for instructions.



Your Responsibilities:

 • Create and schedule content for TikTok + Instagram

 • Edit videos using CapCut + VN + Instagram Reels editor

 • Design aesthetic Carousel posts, stories, flyers, and highlights using Canva

 • Research trending audio + ideas relevant to wellness & spas

 • Build & maintain highlights (FAQs, Reviews, Sauna, Float, Events)

 • Create promotional graphics (e.g. Mother’s Day specials, events, packages)

 • Outreach to local Melbourne ambassadors via WhatsApp/Instagram

 • Use ChatGPT for caption-writing + messaging templates

 • Track tasks & updates inside Trello



Aesthetic Requirements (Non-Negotiable):

You must understand how to create visually clean, cohesive content.

That includes:

 • Matching brand colours

 • Minimalist layouts

 • Wellness-focused visual tone

 • Consistent font pairings

 • Clean spacing & hierarchy



Influencer/Ambassador Outreach:

Criteria for outreach:

 • Location: Melbourne, Australia

 • Followers: 5,000 minimum

 • Niche: Wellness, fitness, beauty or lifestyle

 • Offer: Free sauna session in exchange for content + tagging

 • Reward: Free future sessions based on code usage



Scripts are provided, but you are expected to adapt as needed.



Skills Required:

 • Canva (advanced visual design for social)

 • CapCut / VN / Reels Editing

 • Instagram + TikTok Management

 • ChatGPT (copywriting + template creation)

 • Trello (task organisation)

 • English (very strong written communications)



Nice-to-Have:

 • Experience with spas, gyms, wellness or beauty brands

 • Basic understanding of sauna & float benefits

 • Scheduling tools (e.g. Later, Planoly, Metricool)



What We Don’t Want:

 • People who only post Canva quotes with zero growth

 • People who wait for instructions all day

 • People who ghost when they’re confused instead of asking

 • People with weak English or zero wellness context



How to Apply:

Send:

 1. A short intro (2–3 sentences)

 2. Instagram/TikTok accounts you’ve worked on (not personal accounts)

 3. 2–3 Canva carousel samples

 4. 1 short video edited by you (Reels style)

 5. Your OnlineJobs.ph profile link

 6. Speed test screenshot

title: Patient Services Representative - 100% Remote
description:
About the Company:

Clarity RCM is a fast-growing medical billing company specializing in end-to-end revenue cycle and account management for private medical practices nationwide. We have been honored with a spot on the prestigious Inc. 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Private Companies in America. We offer competitive pay, perks and career growth.



About the Role:

We are seeking a highly skilled Patient Services Representative with extensive medical billing experience to support our dermatology clients. This role is critical to both patient satisfaction and revenue performance. You will serve as the primary point of contact for patients with billing-related questions, while also identifying and resolving underlying insurance and claims issues.



This is not an entry-level role. Candidates must have a strong working knowledge of medical billing and insurance processes. Experience supporting dermatology practices is a major advantage.



Key Responsibilities:

-Handle high inbound call volumes and written inquiries 
 and messaging) from patients across multiple client accounts

-Clearly explain patient balances, insurance adjustments, deductibles, co-insurance, and EOBs in a patient-friendly manner

-Collect patient payments over the phone in compliance with PCI and HIPAA standards

-Review claims and billing activity to identify root causes of patient balances, including denials, underpayments, and posting issues

-Accurately document interactions and outcomes in the practice management system

-Escalate complex billing or insurance issues to the appropriate internal billing teams or client contacts when necessary

-Deliver consistently professional, empathetic, and solutions-oriented customer service



Required Skills / Experience:

-Extensive experience in medical billing is required. Applicants without medical billing experience will not be considered.

-Strong understanding of U.S. medical insurance, including eligibility, benefits, deductibles, co-insurance, denials, and appeals

-Ability to analyze claims, EOBs, and account histories to diagnose billing issues accurately

-Prior experience supporting dermatology practices is highly preferred

-Proficiency with practice management and EHR systems; ability to learn new systems quickly

-Strong computer skills and excellent typing accuracy

-Clear and fluent American accent with strong verbal communication skills

-Exceptional customer service skills with a calm, professional, and empathetic demeanor

-High attention to detail and ability to manage a fast-paced, high-volume workload



**Application Requirement:

We would love to get to know you better. Please include the following with your application:

-A 1-minute introductory video

-Your resume



Please share both via a Google Drive link. About the Company:

We have been honored with a spot on the prestigious Inc. 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Private Companies in America. We offer competitive pay, perks and career growth.

We are seeking a highly skilled Patient Services Representative with extensive medical billing experience to support our dermatology clients. You will serve as the primary point of contact for patients with billing-related questions, while also identifying and resolving underlying insurance and claims issues.



This is not an entry-level role. Candidates must have a strong working knowledge of medical billing and insurance processes. Experience supporting dermatology practices is a major advantage.

Handle high inbound call volumes and written inquiries

Prior experience supporting dermatology practices is highly preferred

Technical and Work-from-Home Requirements

title: Financial Analyst w/ Salesforce Exp
description:
Overview:



We are seeking a highly driven and strategic Financial Analyst to serve as a key partner to the executive leadership team. This role is ideal for a finance professional who combines strong technical expertise with business acumen and thrives in a fast-paced, data-driven environment. The successful candidate will transform complex financial data into meaningful insights, enabling informed decision-making that supports organizational growth, operational excellence, and long-term profitability.



Job Title: Financial Analyst

Location: Fully Remote

Job Type: Full-Time



Key Responsibilities



Executive Financial Partnership

Act as a trusted financial advisor to the CEO by delivering high-impact analysis, forecasts, and strategic recommendations.

Translate financial data into executive-ready insights that drive performance, scalability, and sustainable growth.

Develop financial models to support investment decisions, operational initiatives, and long-term planning.



Strategic Analysis & Business Intelligence



Identify emerging trends, risks, and opportunities through advanced financial and operational analysis.

Research market dynamics, competitor positioning, and industry benchmarks to strengthen strategic direction.

Establish and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate business health and guide leadership decisions.



Syndication Leadership



Oversee syndication processes, ensuring seamless coordination between lenders, investors, and internal stakeholders.

Manage the preparation of documentation, payment processing, and distribution with precision and timeliness.

Safeguard compliance with syndication agreements and applicable regulatory standards.



Commission Oversight



Administer commission structures with accuracy and transparency.

Ensure timely calculations and disbursements while continuously improving process efficiency and controls.

Financial Accounting & Reporting Excellence

Lead Financial Accounting and Reporting activities, ensuring accuracy, integrity, and adherence to best practices.

Prepare executive-level financial reports, dashboards, and presentations that clearly communicate performance, forecasts, and strategic implications.

Strengthen reporting frameworks to enhance visibility and support data-driven leadership.



Operational Efficiency & Systems



Utilize advanced Excel capabilities to build dynamic financial models and automate reporting workflows.

Leverage QuickBooks expertise to maintain reliable financial data and support the full cycle of accounting.

Perform thorough bank reconciliations and implement controls that promote quality and financial accuracy.

Continuously identify opportunities to optimize financial processes and elevate reporting standards.



Required Skills & Qualifications



Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related discipline.

Minimum of 3+ years of progressive experience in financial analysis, accounting, or financial management.

Demonstrated expertise in the full cycle of accounting, including reconciliations, reporting, and close processes.

Strong foundation in Financial Accounting and Reporting within a growth-oriented organization.

QuickBooks Certification or advanced working knowledge required.

Proven commitment to quality, accuracy, and strong internal controls.

Exceptional communication skills with the ability to influence and engage executive stakeholders.

Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including complex formulas, PivotTables, and financial modeling.

High level of analytical rigor with the ability to synthesize complex data into clear strategic insights.

Strong organizational skills with the capacity to manage multiple priorities independently.



Preferred Leadership Traits



Executive presence with a proactive, solutions-oriented mindset.

Strategic thinker capable of balancing big-picture vision with meticulous execution.

High degree of professionalism, discretion, and integrity when handling confidential financial information.

Adaptable, resilient, and comfortable operating in a dynamic, high-growth environment.

Collaborative partner who builds strong cross-functional relationships.

title: Site Selection Analyst
description:
Site Selection Analyst (Remote – Full Time)



Industry: Data Center Development & Digital Infrastructure

Schedule: Full-Time (40 hours/week)

Location: 100% Remote



About Outlaw Ventures



Outlaw Ventures is a powered land and infrastructure development firm focused on

next-generation data center campuses. We specialize in identifying, evaluating, and advancing

large-scale sites at the intersection of power infrastructure, land development, and digital

infrastructure. Our work supports hyperscale, colocation, and emerging compute users across

key U.S. markets.



Role Overview

We are seeking a Site Selection Analyst to support our development pipeline through

geospatial analysis, power infrastructure mapping, and land evaluation. This role is analytical

and technical in nature and is ideal for someone with experience in GIS, infrastructure

mapping, land analysis, or site selection.



This is not an executive assistant or administrative role. The position supports development and

strategy teams through data analysis, mapping, and research.

What You’ll Do



Geospatial & Market Analysis

? Conduct GIS-based analysis to identify and screen potential data center development

sites

? Build and maintain mapping layers related to:

? Electric transmission lines and substations

? Utility service territories

? Fiber and telecommunications routes

? Parcel boundaries and land ownership

? Zoning, environmental, floodplain, and topographic constraints

? Create clear maps and visual outputs for internal decision-making and presentations

? Support market analysis related to power availability, land characteristics, and

infrastructure expansion



Power Infrastructure Mapping

? Map and analyze transmission proximity, substations, and interconnection potential

? Maintain datasets related to utility territories and power constraints

? Support early-stage power strategy by identifying regions favorable for large-load

projects



Land & Site Evaluation

? Evaluate parcels for development suitability, including:

? Acreage and configuration

? Topography and access

? Environmental and zoning limitations

? Assist with comparative analysis across multiple candidate sites

? Support early due diligence efforts through research and data coordination



Collaboration & Reporting

? Work closely with development and leadership teams

? Assist with site selection reports, summaries, and internal databases

? Coordinate data collection with brokers, utilities, and consultants

What This Role Is Not

? Not an executive assistant or administrative role

? Not calendar, inbox, or scheduling focused

? Not client support or sales



What You’ll Gain

? Exposure to real-world data center site selection and powered land strategy

? Experience working with power and infrastructure data

? Hands-on involvement in large-scale development projects

? Opportunity to grow technical and analytical skills in a high-growth sector



Required Background & Experience

This role is best suited for candidates with experience in technical, analytical, or

research-focused roles, such as:

? GIS Analyst

title: Project Manager - CRO Agency (Full-Time, EST Hours)
description:
We are a conversion rate optimization (CRO) agency helping eCommerce brands increase revenue, average order value, and lifetime value through weekly testing sprints. We're looking for a highly organized, proactive Project Manager who can independently manage 4+ client accounts running simultaneous weekly sprints—keeping work flowing smoothly without constant oversight.



What You'll Do:



- Manage weekly CRO sprints for 5+ eCommerce clients, each with distinct deliverables, testing priorities, and deadlines

- Create all monthly tasks in ClickUp immediately after client planning sessions, with proper specs, deadlines, and priority tags

- Coordinate with our outsourced design/development team to ensure tasks move through production on schedule

- Route approved designs to development and revision notes back to designers/developers without prompting

- Manage client communication: Deliver design/dev assets for review, collect feedback, and route revisions back to production within same business day

- Attend all client calls and planning sessions, take detailed notes, and independently convert discussions into actionable ClickUp tasks

- Provide bi-daily status updates (12pm and 4pm EST) covering tasks completed, blockers, and what needs attention

- Submit weekly sprint reports every Friday showing progress across all clients, upcoming deadlines, and any issues requiring strategic input

- Proactively flag and resolve blockers before they delay sprints—don't wait to be asked





What We're Looking For:



- 3-5 years proven PM experience managing multiple simultaneous projects in an agency, eCommerce, or CRO environment

- Agile/sprint methodology experience—you understand how weekly sprints work and can maintain 
ntum independently

- Strong ownership mentality: You drive work forward without constant check-ins or reminders

- Exceptional written communication and professional client-facing skills

- Proactive problem-solver: You identify issues early and bring solutions, not just status updates

- Detail-oriented but fast-paced: Nothing slips through cracks, but you keep sprint velocity high

- Comfortable working EST hours (9am-5pm or 10am-6pm EST)





Must Have Direct Experience With:



- ClickUp (daily task management, automations, custom fields)

- Slack (team coordination, client communication)

- Figma (reviewing designs, understanding handoff specs)

- GHL (Go High Level) is a plus but not required



Ideal Background:



- Previous experience with CRO, A/B testing, or eCommerce optimization projects

- Worked with outsourced or remote design/dev teams

- Managed 4+ clients simultaneously with weekly deliverables



How to Apply:

- Please use 15 Apply Points when submitting your application.



Include:



- Your resume

- Brief note (3-4 sentences) about your project management experience specifically with weekly sprints or recurring client deliverables

- One specific example of how you kept a multi-stakeholder project on track when timelines were tight or blockers emerged

- Must include "44" in your response so we know you read the full posting

title: Senior IT Support Engineer
description:
Hello!



We're an MSP (Managed IT Services Provider) in Miami, Florida (USA) that's expanding and we’re looking for additional full-time tea
mbers. Right now, we’re hiring Senior Support Specialists (Tier 3) to help us with deployment projects as well as our clients’ app issues. The majority of our clients are on Win11, and we manage their Windows Servers, networks and Microsoft365/AzureAD.



We are a fast-paced, fun group of smart guys & gals who are passionate about tech, constantly learning & trying out new things. We love to help our clients' businesses run smoother with technology - they are appreciative of our help and see us as important partners in their success.



If you're looking for a better schedule with great compensation and room for real growth, instead of the same thing year-after-year, keep reading...



THIS IS FOR A LONG-TERM, FULL-TIME, 40+ HOURS PER WEEK REMOTE POSITION, ON A USA (Miami, Florida) ***DAYTIME EST SCHEDULE*** (approx 9am-6pm). SALARY IS BETWEEN 80K-120K PHP PER MONTH DEPENDING ON EXPERIENCE, PLUS BENEFITS INCLUDING HEALTH INS AND 13th MONTH.



Key skills you should have to really do great with us:

• At least 5yrs actual support experience, since this is a senior-level position, not entry-level learning.

• Knows the Windows desktop side very well - removing malware, resolving apps & file issues etc. (Adobe, Quickbooks etc)

• Good familiarity with Microsoft 365 administration - users, roles, policies, mailboxes, etc.

• Comfortable with Windows Server administration (Hardware issues, Active Directory, GPOs, etc.)

• Enjoys HELPING others - at the end of the day, this is really why we do this!

• Excellent written & spoken English is *required*, but if you also know Spanish that is a plus

• Reliable primary internet with a reliable backup hotspot





If you feel you are a good fit, please send an
 to 
 with the EXACT subject of "Applying for remote tech position". Do NOT apply thru Onlinejobs, and DO NOT send a resume yet, that will come later. You will be sent back further instructions for completing our hiring process.

title: VA needed -Marketing Strategist- Full Time, WFH, US Hours
description:
Hello there, awesome VA!



I'm the owner of a small IT company (9 employees- 3 in the Philippines and 6 in the US/ Costa Rica). We're based in Arizona, USA. We provide IT services to small businesses, cybersecurity, and cloud services as well.



We have 3 amazing VAs already, but we're getting busier, and we can use your help...



SOME OF THE EXPECTATIONS YOU SHOULD HAVE WHEN WORKING WITH US:



• Ongoing (monthly) manager review and feedback- you should never guess where you are "standing" and what you, AND THE COMPANY, can do better!

• Paid certifications- we will pay for your courses, tests, and allocate time during business hours to help you achieve your desired goals

• Paid vacations- it's important to us that you are happy, healthy, and have a work-life balance!

• Bonuses- when we win, you win!

• Raises- As we grow, we believe you should as well. We have to stay competitive as an employer to retain our awesome employees!

• Opportunities to grow- In our industry, we can't be on "cruise control"... We need to push our tea
mbers to stay ahead of the technology curve. Help you continually sharpen your skills with a focus on your career aspirations.

• Paid sick days- We understand life happens. We don't want you to feel that you have to drag yourself to work sick, if your body tells you to relax...



JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:



Note: While it seems like a LOT is included here, I prefer to list everything I can think of now to avoid major surprises. These tasks are currently handled by our virtual assistants. You will receive training and support to ensure you are comfortable with each responsibility.



Your MAIN responsibilities:



• As a Marketing Strategist, you’ll use AI tools, especially GPT, to write clear, persuasive marketing content and engaging B2B stories. You’ll work closely with the CEO to build marketing systems that help attract leads, increase engagement, and support growth. You’ll need to follow the brand’s voice, work quickly, and focus on the results that matter.

• Responsible for Marketing Analytics

-Analyze marketing campaign performance across digital and traditional channels to identify trends and opportunities.

-Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to monitor key marketing metrics such as ROI, conversion rates, and customer acquisition cost.

-Conduct customer segmentation and targeting analysis to enhance personalization and engagement.

-Perform A/B testing and interpret results to guide campaign optimization.

-Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate data insights into actionable marketing strategies.

-Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders to support data-driven decision-making.

• Social media management (LinkedIn,
, X.com, and Instagram)

• Work alongside our Marketing Consultant and Full Stack Developers on the business development/marketing side of the business.

• Present strategy proposals and performance reports to stakeholders

• Using
 marketing tools like Glasshive, Eventbrite, and other tools for marketing campaigns and assisting with event coordination, venues, guest speakers, and attendees.

• Basic lead generation using Apollo & LinkedIn



OTHER tasks that you can assist with:



• Provide
/call/chat support for inquiries, coordinate information with both clients and company employees (This is NOT a tech support job, but you will assist with coordinating service calls and meetings with clients and vendors)

• Calendar management

• Coordinate courier pickups and deliveries.

• Assist with basic internal audits, documentation, and file management

• Website (WordPress) basic content changes

• Create website and marketing content (Technology-related blog posts from vendor-provided materials, our engineers, and social media.

• Post jobs, candidate screening, review and respond to applications, scheduling interviews, and interview with applicants when needed.

• Assist with projects as needed



WORK HOURS:

• Mon-Fri at 8am-5:30pm (Arizona time zone- MST -7)

• Paid (US) holidays, time-off



REQUIRED:

• AMAZING personality and work ethic

• Excellent written and verbal English with minimal accent

• At least 3-5 years of experience as a Marketing Strategist or similar roles like Digital Marketing Manager, Marketing Analyst, Marketing Manager, Performance Marketing Manager, Growth Marketing Manager, Integrated Marketing Manager, or Digital Marketing Specialist.

• Experience in office applications such as Word, Excel, Outlook, and Teams

• Experience with GPT-4, Claude, or similar AI tools

• Experience in Social Media Marketing, LinkedIn,
, YouTube Shorts

and
 marketing.

• Knowledgeable in Marketing Analytics

• Copywriting frameworks (PAS, AIDA, etc.)

• Experience in Canva, Notion, Cap Cut, Descript, social media management tools, and simple video editing

• Experience in Digital Marketing

• Metrics-driven content strategy and growth loops

• Experience with, and understanding of SEO

• Content Writing

• Technologically savvy

• Knowledge of ticketing systems is a bonus, but not required.

• Knowledgeable with basic data entry



MORE DETAILS:

• A PRE-EMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND CHECK is performed (on our expense). You must have a 100% clean background check. Please do not apply if you don't have a 100% clean background check.

• As part of this position requirement, you must have a computer that will be used exclusively for your work with us. This means we will be installing our security software on that computer, will remove admin rights from you, and monitor/ control it for security and compliance reasons. In return, we will pay you additional “rent” fees, on top of your salary, in the amount of several hundred dollars. Details about this “rental” will be discussed during your second interview. There are minimum requirements that your computer must have in order to be employed with us. You must have a Computer/Laptop with at least i5 minimum 9th gen processor (preferably a newer one) with 16 GB RAM or more, or Ryzen 5/7 (MUST include TPM support) as well as Windows 11 OS.

• You must have a fast and reliable internet connection, minimum 30mbps.

• Noise-cancelling headphones

• At least 1 year of experience working night shift

• Further details and information will be discussed with qualified candidates.



HOW TO APPLY?



Answer the questions below, or you may also send an
 to 
 with the subject line “MS-Feb2026” with your answers:



- An attachment of your resume in PDF format/ link of you resume if you will send us a message.

- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you have a 100% clean background with no criminal history.

- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you understand the business hours (MST\ Arizona time zone.

- A confirmation that you have experience with night shift/ working at night.



Answer the following questions: (We have ways to check if your answer is AI-generated. Be as organic and honest in answering the questions. You will be asked to do a quiz/short tasks to gauge your knowledge during the hiring process.)

1. Can you describe your experience managing social media platforms, including the types of content you've created and the tools you've used?

-What social media platforms have you worked with, and what strategies have you implemented to grow engagement or reach?

2. Can you share your experience with SEO, including any tools you've used and strategies you've applied to improve search rankings?

-What specific SEO techniques have you implemented, and what results did you achieve?

3. Can you describe your experience with marketing analytics, including the tools you've used and how you've applied data to improve campaign performance?

-What key metrics do you typically track, and how do you use them to guide marketing decisions?

-Have you worked with platforms like Google Analytics(GA4), Google Tag Manager,
, LinkedIn & Youtube Analytics? If so, how have you used them?



- NO other information/cover letter or attachments should be included, besides a simple salutation and signature if so desired.



Only those who have followed the above instructions will be contacted within up to 2 business days with further instructions.



HIRING PROCESS:

- Resume submission

- Applicant questionnaire form

- Short tasks

-Initial Interview

- Final Interview



We're looking forward to having you join our family!



Beits Livneh, Owner

Gallop Technology Group

title: L2 Tech Support Engineer
description:
Dear Technology Lover!

We're a small (but VERY efficient) 20-year-old MSP based in Arizona.

As a small company. we're VERY employee-focused, and believe that our tea
mbers are our MOST IMPORTANT ASSET!



Here are some of the things you can expect from working with us:

• Ongoing (monthly) manager review and feedback- you should never guess where you are "standing" and what you, AND THE COMPANY, can do better!

• Paid certifications- we will pay for your courses, and tests and allocate time during business hours to help you achieve your desired goals

• Opportunities to grow- In our industry, we can't be on "cruise control"... We need to push our tea
mbers to stay ahead of the technology curve. Help you continually to sharpen your skills with a focus on your career aspirations.

• Paid sick days- We understand life happens. We don't want you to feel that you have to drag yourself to work sick if your body tells you to relax...



You're the right fit if you:

• LOVE learning, working with, and experimenting with new technology

• Get excited when you save someone's day and provide great service

• Are a hard-working fun person, and see yourself being in the IT industry for the foreseeable future

• Want to work in a GROWING environment, with STABLE income, Bonuses, and a great attitude!

• Want the opportunity to advance and learn more!



Some of the responsibilities that your position will include are:

Helpdesk (mostly escalations, but some basic if needed), cyber security related tasks/ audits, cloud hosting and virtualization (HyperV, SonicWall, VPN), MS365 management and automation, BCDR (Axcient), networking (Unifi, Sonicwall), IT projects, Servers maintenance (Windows only), scripts creation, testing new technology and other tasks related to IT.



IMPORTANT:

This position requires AT LEAST 2 years of MSP experience and at least 2 years experience in an L2 position, supervisory, or lead role. 100% clean background check, highly organized, technologically savvy, and can work diligently with little 
veral hiring steps will take place to verify the above requirements, including reference checking, employment verification, technical testing, and more.



Minimum technical level that you will need to be able to pass a test on:

• Explaining to a non-technical person what the "cloud" is

• Explaining what the differences are between traditional anti-virus and XDR

• Creating a new Virtual Machine on Hyper-V host, from an ISO file located on a different computer on the network.

• Explaining the differences and commonalities between SharePoint and OneDrive.

• Creating an Intune policy that will install Firefox on an Azure-joined VM, and make Firefox the default browser, with the specific home page we'll provide to you during the test.

• Several other situational and technical questions.

• CCNA certificate candidates preferred but not required.



MORE DETAILS:

• A PRE-EMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND CHECK is performed (at our expense). You must have 100% clean background check. Please do not apply if you don't have 100% clean background check.

• Personality is KEY for us. We are looking for an easy-going, yet professional, friendly and HONEST person.

• You will be working from home. This means you must have a quiet work environment and no excessive background noise.

• FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET SERVICE IS REQUIRED With at least 100Mbps download speed  20+Mbps upload speed.

• As part of this position requirement, you must have a computer that will be used exclusively for your work with us. This means we will be installing our security software on that computer, will remove admin rights from you, and monitor/ control it for security and compliance reasons. In return, we will pay you additional “rent” fees, on top of your salary, in the amount of several hundred dollars. Details about this “rental” will be discussed during your second interview. There are minimum requirements that your computer must have, in order to be employed with us. You must have a Computer/Laptop with at least i5 minimum 9th gen processor (preferably a newer one) with 16 GB RAM or more or Ryzen 5/7 (MUST include TPM support) as well as Windows 11 OS.

• You must have recently worked on a night shift for 2 consecutive years or more.

• We evaluate/ review employees monthly and provide consistent feedback.

• We offer raises and bonuses according to performance, certifications, attitude, and customer reviews twice/ year.

• Your manager (our IT director) will create a roadmap for your "KPIs" and certifications track. We always push our team to earn certifications and additional knowledge – even allowing “disconnect study time” during business hours!

• On-call rotation (after-hours) for a week at a time, once every 4-5 weeks. It's VERY rare that we get calls after-hours (the average is only twice/ year!).

• We're closed on major US holidays, and at the completion of the first 3 months of employment, you'll qualify for paid holidays.

• Work hours are Mon-Fri at 8 am till 5:30 pm (UTC-07:00 , MST, Arizona time zone)

• Every 4 to 5 weeks, you'll be working 1/2 day on a Saturday (project work/catch-up work) and get 1/2 day off the week after

• Mandatory 1-hour lunch and additional breaks (as you need those) throughout the day.

• Further details and information will be discussed with qualified candidates.



EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:

• REQUIRED: Relevant minimum 2 YEARS experience working for an MSP

• REQUIRED: With AT LEAST 2 years experience in an L2 position, supervisory or lead role.

• REQUIRED: Microsoft Azure AD/ M365 experience

• REQUIRED: Experience working with an RMM and PSA software (DATTO preferred)

• Preferred: Cyber Security education/experience

• Preferred: Hyper-V experience



Other tools we use:

Barracuda DNS filter, AutoElevate, Cylance, Infocyte, Syxsense, IT Glue, SonicWall, Unifi, and more



HOW TO APPLY?



Answer the questions below, or you may also send an
 to 
 with the subject line "L2 Tech Support - Feb2026" with your answers:



- An attachment of your resume in PDF format/ link of you resume if you will send us a message.

- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you have a 100% clean background with no criminal history.

- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you understand the business hours (MST\ Arizona time zone.



Answer the following questions:

1. How many years of experience do you have working in an MSP company? Name of the MSP company/s you worked with.

2. Do you have at least 2 years experience in an L2 position, supervisory or lead role?

3. Do you have experience working with RMM and PSA software? What applications did you use?

title: Illustrator Needed for Ongoing Children’s Book Series
description:
We’re looking for an illustrator to partner on multiple children’s books within the same story world. This is not a one-off project. It’s long-term, series-based work.



We’re not just looking for someone who can draw—we’re looking for someone who can help tell a story visually, consistently, book after book.



What matters most:



You can illustrate characters consistently across many scenes and books.



You understand storytelling, pacing, and emotion, not just single images.



You’re comfortable working within clear constraints (character specs, style rules, direction, print requirements).



You collaborate well, take feedback professionally, and revise without ego.



Your work shows warmth, personality, and emotional range—especially for children.



Ideal background (not all required):



Children’s books, illustration series, comics, storyboarding, or animation.



A portfolio showing the same character in multiple scenes or expressions.



Ability to explain your visual choices clearly and practically.



How we’ll choose:

Final candidates will be asked to complete a paid test illustration using a provided character reference and short scene. This is about fit, not speed.



If you enjoy building a world, not just individual pictures—and want to be part of a series that grows over time—we’d love to see your work.

title: General Virtual Assistant - HIRING IMMEDIATELY
description:
We’re hiring a General Virtual Assistant with Video Editing skills for a long-term role supporting a US-based digital career and finance brand. You’ll help turn raw footage into high-retention long-form + short-form content while also handling structured admin and operations tasks.



This role is for someone who is structured, fast, reliable, and creative inside systems.



YOU'RE A GREAT FIT IF YOU ARE:



- Structured, fast, and detail-oriented

- Able to follow SOPs exactly without repeated questions

- A quick learner who can replicate editing styles from reference videos independently

- Comfortable doing both creative and admin/operational tasks consistently

- Calm communicator, great at contributing creative ideas,  takes feedback well, and improves quickly

- Organized and reliable with deadlines and checklists



REQUIRED SKILLS:



- Video editing experience in CapCut / Premiere Pro / Final Cut / DaVinci

- Able to add text, graphics, b-roll, motion elements, captions, transitions, pacing cuts

- Strong QA habits (you review your work before submission)

- Strong attention to detail and instruction following skills

- Comfortable with basic admin: trackers, calendars, file organization, research, data entry, comment management

- Experience with some of the major video content social media sites (YouTube, Tiktok, Instagram, FB etc)



ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES:



- Video (creative + retention focused)

- Edit YouTube long-form videos and shorts

- Create clips for TikTok/Reels/Shorts

- Add retention boosters: hooks, pacing, captions, motion text/graphics, b-roll, sfx

- Replicate style from sample/reference videos (no step-by-step handholding)



Operations/Admin (structured execution)



- Maintain content trackers and folder organization

- Research, data entry, system updates, and comment management

- Assist with content planning + calendar updates

- Research competitors, trends, and audience insights

- Pull basic analytics + compile weekly/monthly reports (template provided)

- Support miscellaneous admin tasks as needed



Perks, Compensation & Benefits:

- Training is provided, so you will know what needs to be done

- Salary - $2.50-6 USD (depending on experience and performance)

- You'll receive 13th-month pay

- Paid weekly

- Monthly performance bonuses for exceeding KPIs

- Annual retention bonus review based on performance

- Performance-based raises

- Promotion path where top performers can become team leads, managing their own teams

- Stable, long-term employment with respectful but clear leadership

- Training and skill development enhancements (AI trainings, social media training, video editing training, writing training etc., there is a lot of training to choose from to continue to enhance your skills)



SCHEDULE REQUIREMENTS

- Must be able to work US EST timezone



HOW TO APPLY (Failing any step = automatic rejection)



: 



Subject line: Applying To – General VA



Include ALL of the following:



1. Your OnlineJobs.ph profile link

2. Your portfolio link (must include 1 long-form + 2 shorts)

3. A 1–2 minute video (Loom/Google Drive link) answering:

-What editing software you use most

-One example of how you improved retention in an edit

-How you make sure you don’t miss details (QA process)

4. Answer this question in 3 bullets only:

- What are 3 admin tasks you’ve done repeatedly for a client/business?

5 - Confirm you're able to work EST time zone

title: Social Media Administrative VA - START NOW!
description:
Do you have an eye for detail? 

Are you highly analytical? 

Are you into social media?

Do you also have a creative side where you love to produce aesthetically pleasing content? 



If you answered yes to these questions. We would love to hear from you!



We’re looking for a highly detail-driven, process-driven VA that loves social media to handle admin support and some basic video editing tasks. If you’ve worked in an administrative support or analytical capacity in the pass you’ll feel at home here, especially if you're good at following SOPs, hitting deadlines, being detailed-oriented and taking inititative to learn new things.



This role is perfect for someone who thrives on structure, pays close attention to detail, and can manage tasks with accuracy and efficiency — while also having a creative eye for editing simple video content with training.



If you’re dependable, analytical, and take pride in producing error-free work, this role is for you.





What You’ll Do



Admin / Ops Support

- Conduct social media research & engagement (with provided criteria and SOPs).

- Assist with community management (comments, conversation starters etc)

- Manage tasks and deadlines using Asana and Slack.

- Assist with moderating live streams

- Update our sales systems and update lead information (including website updates,
 marketing systems etc)

- Proofread, track, and update documents and spreadsheets accurately.

- Keep digital files and data organized

- Perform daily/weekly reporting 



Basic Video Editing

- Cut faceless videos (CapCut or similar): remove mistakes/dead air, keep audio/video seamless, add end screens/CTAs, QA before handoff.- Edit short and long-form videos (training provided) using CapCut or similar tools.

- Apply cuts, sync video and audio, remove mistakes/dead air, and QA thoroughly.

- Add thumbnails, descriptions, captions and end screens for YouTube & TikTok uploads.

- Maintain consistency with branding and channel standards.



Quality Control

- Perform thorough QA checks on all work before submission.

- Follow SOPs exactly as provided without deviation.

- Take clear notes during training to avoid repeated mistakes.



_____________________________________________________________________



You're a great FIT if you have

- Background in - social medica, content creation, claims/insurance ops, medical billing, finance, QA/compliance, paralegal, data entry auditing, payroll, or any field that has required a great deal of attention to detail.

- Strong attention to detail and ability to follow processes step by step.

- Excellent time management skills — able to complete tasks wihtin deadlines and efficiently without dragging hours.

- Reliable, proactive, and takes ownership of outcomes of work.

- Nice to have and confirmation learning: video editing tools (CapCut, Canva) — experience is a plus, but the right analytical mindset matters most.

- Project management experience in Asana, Notion, ClickUp, Slack





Bonus Points If You Have

- Previous experience editing YouTube videos or short-form content.

- Familiarity with Canva for basic graphics and thumbnails.

- Experience managing tasks in tools like Asana, Trello, or Hubstaff.





Why Join Us

- Work with a growing digital content online business.

- Flexible remote work with opportunities for growth into a leadership role and cross-training.

- Clear systems, SOPs, and feedback to set you up for success.

- Long-term potential for the right candidate who demonstrates consistency and results

- Training is provided, so you will know what needs to be done

- Salary - $2-5 USD (depending on experience and performance)

- You'll receive 13th-month pay

- Paid weekly

- Monthly performance bonuses for exceeding KPIs

- Annual retention bonus review based on performance

- Performance-based raises

- Promotion path where top performers can become team leads, managing their own teams

- Stable, long-term employment with respectful but clear leadership

- Training and skill development enhancements (AI trainings, social media training, video editing training, writing training etc., there is a lot of training to choose from to continue to enhance your skills)





How to Apply ( Read Carefully)



 
 with the subject: “Applying To – SM Admin VA - [Your Name]” and include ALL items below in order in your
: 



1- Your OnlineJobs.ph profile link

2- Resume (PDF)

3- Include a 1-2 minute intro video introducing yourself and why you’re a fit for this role

4- Add your portfolio or samples of your work (admin tasks, spreadsheets, and video edits)

5- Confirm in your
 that you’re available to work EST hours

6- Put the word OWL at the end of your
 so we know you read this



If these interview steps are not followed your application will not be considered. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Operations Coordinator
description:
The Role

We are looking for a detail-oriented, AI-comfortable professional to manage our AI-powered
 and document processing pipeline. You will be the human-in-the-loop between our AI systems and our accounting team, ensuring bills and documents are correctly processed, routed, and tracked.



This is a focused, specific role. You are monitoring the flow of information through our AI systems and making sure nothing falls through the cracks.



What You Will Do

Monitor AI inboxes that receive vendor bills and documents across multiple client accounts



Review AI-processed PDF drafts for accuracy (correct vendor, amount, date, document type)



Flag and log errors or issues for our development team



Forward and route documents to the correct tea
mbers



Track issue resolution and escalate when needed



Support our programmer with testing and refining AI features



Maintain organized records of what was processed, flagged, or escalated



What We Are Looking For

Strong attention to detail. This is the #1 requirement.



Comfortable using AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, or similar). You do not need to build AI, but you need to work alongside it daily.



Excellent
 management skills. You will be living in
 inboxes.



Ability to follow documented processes consistently without cutting corners



Reliable internet connection and professional remote work setup



Strong written English communication



Experience with Google Workspace (Gmail, Sheets, Drive)



Experience with task management tools (Asana preferred, but not required)



What to Expect

Structured onboarding with clear processes and documentation



Daily check-ins during your first 2 weeks



A 2-week evaluation checkpoint to make sure the role is a good fit for both sides



Room to grow as we expand our AI operations



How to Apply

Send us a message with:



A brief summary of your relevant experience



What AI tools you currently use and how you use them



Your availability and preferred working hours



Your expected salary within the posted range

title: Operations & Onboarding VA
description:
Type: Part-time, remote (~20 hrs/week, with growth potential to full-time)

Product: FocusProject (One of my businesses.... construction operations platform)



The Role

This role combines data entry and lead management with customer onboarding and basic training. You will communicate directly with clients to help them get started on the platform while keeping our lead data clean and reliable.



Our clients are small builders and contractors using FocusProject to run their jobs more smoothly.



This role starts at approximately 20 hours per week, with the opportunity to grow into a full-time position as onboarding volume and responsibilities increase.



What You’ll Do

1. Onboard new customers and guide them through first use

2. Provide basic app walkthroughs and answer common usage questions

3. Enter, clean, and maintain lead data we provide

4. Research and add new qualified leads

5. Document recurring onboarding issues and lead patterns



You’re a Fit If

1. You are detail-oriented and reliable

2. You follow systems and improve them when you see inefficiencies

3. You use tools (including AI) to speed up structured, repeatable work

4. You’re comfortable doing focused work without constant supervision

5. You communicate clearly and professionally



Requirements

1. VA, operations, or administrative experience

2. Strong written English

3. Comfortable with CRMs, spreadsheets, and web research

4. Able to switch between customer-facing and data-focused work



Success in this role means customers feel confident using the platform, our lead data stays clean and reliable, and work moves forward without dropped balls or last-minute fixes.



Application Instructions (Read Carefully)

To confirm you follow directions and pay attention to detail, all applicants must complete the following:

1. Subject Line Requirement: Put the word ZIPPY at the start of your application subject line or first message.

2. Introduction Video (Required):  Attach a 1-minute introduction video:

     a. Camera on

     b. No slides

     c. No screen sharing

3. In the video, briefly explain:

     a.  Your background in operations or virtual assistant work

     b.  One system or process you are good at keeping organized



Applications that miss any of the above steps will not be reviewed.

title: SEO / SEM (B2B SaaS – Construction Tech)
description:
Time: Part-time (~20 hrs/week), remote

Path: Can grow into full-time based on results

Company: FocusProject (one of my companies)



The Role

You will own search-driven customer acquisition for FocusProject. SEO is the primary lever, with SEM used to support and accelerate learning. The focus is on intent, conversion, and measurable outcomes.



What You’ll Do

1. Identify high-intent keywords builders search when ready to buy

2. Build and optimize pages that rank and convert

3. Use SEM to validate demand and inform SEO decisions

4. Tie work directly to demos, leads, and customers

5. D
 what not to work on—and explain why



What This Is Not

1. Social media, branding, or content calendars

2. Vanity metrics, SEO theater, or busywork

3. A generalist marketing role



Requirements

1. Proven SEO results tied to real business outcomes

2. Working SEM experience (Google Ads or equivalent)

3. Strong on-page SEO and content strategy skills



Growth Path

This role starts at approximately 20 hours per week. As results are proven and inbound demand increases, the role can expand in scope and hours, with a clear path to a full-time position for the right person.



Application Instructions (Read Carefully)

To confirm attention to detail and clarity of thinking:

1. Start your application subject line or message with the word ZIPPY

2. Include a short written response (5–7 sentences max) answering:

     “What makes a keyword commercially valuable?”



Applications that miss either step will not be reviewed.

title: Junior Land Acquisitions Manager
description:
We are expanding our acquisitions team and are looking for a hungry, sales-driven Junior Acquisitions Manager who wants to earn more than typical hourly or salaried roles through performance-based real estate sales.



This role offers clear room for growth. As performance improves, there are opportunities to earn higher commissions, handle higher-value deals, and grow into senior acquisition or leadership roles.



You will be speaking directly with U.S. property owners, running structured conversations, and negotiating purchase terms using proven systems and guidance. This position is ideal for someone who is confident on the phone, coachable, and motivated by results rather than guaranteed pay.



What You’ll Be Doing



- Making and receiving calls/texts with property owners

- Running structured discovery conversations

- Identifying seller motivation and price flexibility

- Negotiating purchase terms with guidance

- Following up consistently until a decision is made

- Keeping pipeline notes and activity organized



Requirements



- Strong spoken and written English (daily communication with U.S. property owners via calls, text, and
)

- Sales, cold calling, or call-center experience preferred (real estate experience strongly recommended but not required)

- Comfortable working in a commission-only role where income is based on performance

- Willing to operate outside a “comfort-based” hourly mindset in exchange for higher earning potential

- Coachable, disciplined, and able to follow systems, scripts, and KPIs

- Comfortable handling high call volume and consistent follow-up

- Available to work evenings and Saturdays as needed (U.S. time zones)

- Reliable work-from-home setup (computer, stable internet, headset)

title: Case Administrative Assistant
description:
We’re seeking a Case Administrative Assistant and the candidate will be paired with our Case Managers, and support them by -



1. Working closely with our case managers and clients, deliver data and related operational tasks.



2. Organize files and documents with clean and clear formatting.



3. Ensure accuracy, logical structure, quality in every document delivered



4. Communicate, answer case questions and provide documentation to the respective party in a timely manner.

title: Content Writer & Communications Specialist
description:
How to apply (required)

Applications are reviewed only through this Google Form: 

To be considered, you must submit three (3) writing samples through the form (links or uploads).

If you don’t have a existing fitting sample for a category, you may submit an original piece instead.



We’re seeking a versatile and skilled Content Writer and Communications Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for writing and a strong understanding of various writing styles, including news reporting, strategic communication, case studies, and application materials. You’ll produce high-quality written work tailored to clients across multiple platforms and audiences. You’ll be expected to do careful research and deliver drafts that require minimal restructuring.



What you’ll write:

Reported & news-style pieces

Research, write, and edit articles on a wide range of topics. Work may involve sourcing, background research (including staying current on relevant news), and synthesizing complex or technical information into clear, readable coverage.

Strategic letters and communications

Draft persuasive, polished correspondence for business and public-facing needs, including stakeholder outreach, proposals, recommendations, and communications with institutions or government entities.

Applications and submissions

Write concise, high-impact materials for awards, memberships, judging opportunities, and similar applications. Emphasis is on representing a client’s achievements and qualifications accurately, and in a way that best fits the submission.

Case studies and client narratives

Developing detailed case studies that highlight successful projects, initiatives, or solutions implemented by our clients. This includes interviewing stakeholders, gathering supporting detail, and presenting results in a credible and compelling narrative.



What we’re looking for

Strong writing across formats: You can adjust voice and structure to fit the audience and purpose without losing clarity.

Research and synthesis: You can gather information from a diverse range of sources, evaluate what matters and is appropriate for the material, and produce writing that reflects sound judgment.

Accuracy and attention to detail: Accurate facts, names, dates, tone, and consistency are non-negotiable, and you know how to verify claims.

Reliability under deadlines: You can manage multiple projects and deliver on time.

Clear communication: You collaborate well and incorporate feedback efficiently. You ask questions early when requirements aren’t fully defined.

Adaptability: You can work across topics and clients, and you’re comfortable with ambiguity.



Education & experience

Bachelor’s degree in Journalism, Communications, English, or a related field (or equivalent experience)

3+ years in journalism, content writing, communications, or a similar role preferred

Knowledge of U.S. immigration and visa requirement criteria is preferred but not required

title: Immigration Case Manager (EB-1, EB-2, O-1)
description:
To Apply:

As a next step, please take this test - 

once done,

Please submit the test here-







We are seeking a candidate to manage immigration cases, with a focus on EB-1, EB-2, and O-1 petitions. This role requires administrative support, immigration judgment, precise documentation standards, and confident client communication.

You will work closely with clients, internal teams, and external attorneys to ensure every case is structured, accurate, and delivered at consistently high standards.



Key Responsibilities:

- Manage client calls for EB-1, EB-2, and O-1 petitions by updating and staying on top of updates.

- Partner closely with clients to gather, validate, and organize case materials aligned with immigration criteria.

- Prepare, review, and organize immigration case files with exceptional attention to clarity, structure, and formatting.

- Ensure every document meets internal quality standards and supports a coherent petition narrative.

- Deliver materials and responses to all parties accurately and on time.

- Track milestones, deadlines, and dependencies across multiple active cases.



Required Qualifications:

- Experience managing EB-1, EB-2 (NIW), O-1 immigration cases

- 2+ years of experience in U.S. immigration documentation, evidence requirements, and petition structure

- Exceptional written communication skills with a sharp eye for detail and logical flow

- Proven ability to manage multiple complex cases simultaneously

- Comfort working cross-functionally with attorneys, clients, and internal teams

- Prior experience at an immigration firm, visa consultancy, or immigration company

- Experience reviewing or coordinating final petition packets before attorney submission

- Process-oriented mindset with an interest in improving systems and quality standards



Benefits:

- Competitive salary

- Work-from-anywhere flexibility

- Opportunity to work for a growing and innovative company

- Be part of a team dedicated to helping people achieve their immigration goals



We look forward to welcoming passionate individuals who are eager to make a difference in the field of immigration.

Join Lima and be part of a team that shapes the future of global immigration services. Apply today!

title: Markiting and Branding
description:
Brand & Marketing Strategy Project (Wellness Business | Remote)

Type: Short-Term Project (Not an ongoing VA role)

Timeline: 6-12 weeks

Hours: Project-based (estimated 30-60 total hours)

Location: Remote (Philippines preferred)

Overview

I’m a wellness professional looking for an experienced Brand & Marketing Strategist to support a defined, short-term project focused on clarifying my brand, messaging, and marketing direction.

This is not an ongoing social media or VA role. I’m looking for someone who enjoys brand clarity, positioning, and strategy, and can deliver thoughtful, practical recommendations.



Project Goals

Clarify brand positioning and messaging

Strengthen consistency across website and social platforms

Define clear content and marketing priorities

Create a simple, realistic marketing plan that fits a service-based wellness business

Scope of Work / Deliverables

The project may include:

Brand & messaging review (website, social media, offers)

Clarified brand voice and positioning summary

Defined content themes and messaging pillars

Marketing recommendations for social media,
, and SEO

A simple 90-day marketing roadmap

Written documentation that can be handed off to a social media/SEO assistant

What I’m Looking For

Experience in brand strategy and marketing (project-based work preferred)

Strong written English and ability to explain ideas clearly

Strategic thinker who also understands real-world execution

Organized, thoughtful, and collaborative

Comfortable working with service-based or wellness businesses



Nice to Have (Not Required)

Experience with wellness, health, or personal service brands

Experience working with solopreneurs or small businesses

Light understanding of social media and SEO strategy (not execution)

Project Terms

Fixed-scope project with clear deliverables

Flexible schedule during project timeline

Paid per project or hourly (to be discussed)

Potential for future strategy projects, but no expectation of ongoing weekly hours

How to Apply

Please include:

A brief introduction about yourself

Your experience with brand and/or marketing strategy

Examples of similar strategy or branding projects you’ve worked on

How you typically approach a branding/marketing strategy project



Please begin your application with the word “Clarity” so I know you read the full post.

title: General Accountant
description:
COMPANY OVERVIEW:

SimpleKeep is a modern US-based accounting company that values our team and creates a fun, dynamic work environment. Our goal is to provide exceptional accounting services to our clients while fostering a positive and supportive team culture. We are a remote team that leverages the latest technology to work together efficiently and effectively.

We're a great company to work for, and a small team, so you'll be able to come in and really have an impact on the way we do business. We're growing, and we’re looking to add an experienced person to our team.



POSITION OVERVIEW:

SimpleKeep is a dynamic and innovative company committed to providing exceptional financial services to our clients. We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented General Accountant with experience in QuickBooks and Xero to join our remote team. This role is perfect for a self-motivated individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is looking to contribute to a growing company.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Financial Reporting:

- Prepare, examine, and analyze financial statements, ensuring accuracy and compliance with accounting standards.

- Generate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports for management review.

2. Bookkeeping:

- Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all financial transactions.

- Reconcile bank statements, accounts payable, and accounts receivable.

3. Budgeting and Forecasting:

- Assist in the preparation of budgets and financial forecasts.

- Monitor and report on budget variances.

4. Tax Preparation:

- Assist in the preparation and filing of tax returns.

- Ensure compliance with federal, state, and local tax regulations.

5. Accounts Management:

- Manage and process payroll, invoices, and expense reports.

- Handle accounts payable and receivable, ensuring timely payments and collections.

6. Software Utilization:

- Utilize QuickBooks and Xero for all accounting functions.

- Ensure accurate data entry and maintenance within these systems.

7. Compliance and Audit:

- Ensure compliance with internal financial and accounting policies and procedures.

- Assist with internal and external audits as needed.

8. Communication:

- Liaise with clients, vendors, and financial institutions as necessary.

- Provide support to the finance team and other departments as needed.



REQUIREMENTS:

- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.

-Minimum of 2 years of experience in accounting or bookkeeping.

-Proficiency in QuickBooks and Xero is mandatory.

- Strong understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting.

-Excellent organizational and time-management skills.

- Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills.

- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks.

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

- CPA or relevant certification is a plus.



WORK ENVIRONMENT:

This is a remote position; candidates must have a reliable internet connection and a dedicated workspace.



BENEFITS:

- Competitive salary and benefits package.

- Flexible work hours and remote work environment.

- Opportunities for growth and advancement.

- A supportive team culture that values work-life balance and employee satisfaction.

- Health card benefit after 9 months of employment.



WORKING SCHEDULE: Tuesday-Saturday 3am-12nn Manila Time



APPLICATION INSTRUCTION:

After you're done reading through the post, if you're ready to apply for the position, please send an
 to 
 sending your
, please be sure to:

1. Attach your resume.

2. Include a summary of your experience.

Our goal is to provide exceptional accounting services to our clients while fostering a positive and supportive team culture. We are a remote team that leverages the latest technology to work together efficiently and effectively.



We're a great company to work for, and a small team, so you'll be able to come in and really have an impact on the way we do business. We're growing, and we’re looking to add an experienced person to our team.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in accounting, a passion for mentoring and developing staff, and a desire to work in a dynamic and supportive team environment. This is a remote position with flexible work hours.

- Mentor and provide guidance to junior accountants and other tea
mbers.
